item.title: My Learning Journey – Salesforce Sharing and Visibility Architect Certification Exam
item.dc:creator: LifeIs2GoLearn
item.description: For common details on Salesforce certification exams, please visit here I passed the Salesforce Sharing and Visibility Designer (Salesforce Sharing and Visibility Architect) exam in January 2021. This is the 4th article in the series of certifications journey leading to achieving Application Architect credentials. I’m sharing my experience, with the thought that this might help READ MORE

item.title: My learning Journey – Salesforce Platform App Builder Certification Exam
item.dc:creator: LifeIs2GoLearn
item.description: For common details on Salesforce certification exams, please visit here I cleared Salesforce platform app builder certification in July 2020. This is the 3rd article in the series of certifications journey leading to achieving Application Architect credentials. There are 3 super-badges recommended for Platform App Builder exam – completing all the three provides a great understanding READ MORE
